inclusion.criterion: single clinical event suggestive of MS within last 2 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: new neurological abnormality present for at least 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other disease that could better explain signs and symptoms
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: scheduled to participate in interventional treatment trial
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: condition that could interfere with MRI evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has experienced similar pain twice in the past year, and ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones. However, no indication of MS or other conditions that would exclude her from participating.
